description: Structured information on an anatomical entity.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa._instruction: Add another anatomical entity representing the anatomical parent structure of this anatomical entity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa.description: Reference to a parent object or legal person.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa.title: hasParent

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this anatomical entity based on anatomical location or characteristics.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.title: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) pointing to the ontological term matching this anatomical entity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.title: ontologyIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/other.description: Structured information on the relation between one anatomical entity and another.

criteria._instruction: Add the protocol execution defining the criteria that were applied to determine this relation.
criteria.description: Aspects or standards on which a judgement or decision is based.
criteria.title: criteria

criteriaQualityType._instruction: Add the quality type of the stated criteria used to determine this relation.
criteriaQualityType.description: Distinct class that defines how the judgement or decision was made for a particular criteria.
criteriaQualityType.title: criteriaQualityType

inRelationTo._instruction: Add the anatomical entity to which the relation is described.
inRelationTo.title: inRelationTo

qualitativeOverlap._instruction: Add the qualitative overlap that best describes the relation between the two anatomical entities.
qualitativeOverlap.description: Semantic characterization of how much two things occupy the same space.
qualitativeOverlap.title: qualitativeOverlap

anyOf.description: Structured information on a quantitative value.

typeOfUncertainty._instruction: Add the type of uncertainty used for this quantitative value.
typeOfUncertainty.description: Distinct technique used to quantify the uncertainty of a measurement.
typeOfUncertainty.title: typeOfUncertainty

uncertainty._instruction: Enter the measurement uncertainty of this quantitative value.
uncertainty.description: Quantitative value range defining the uncertainty of a measurement.
uncertainty.title: uncertainty

unit._instruction: Add the unit of measurement of this quantitative value.
unit.description: Determinate quantity adopted as a standard of measurement.
unit.title: unit

value._instruction: Enter the measurement value of this quantitative value.
value.title: value

maxValue._instruction: Add the maximum value measured for this range.
maxValue.title: maxValue

minValue._instruction: Add the minimum value measured for this range.
minValue.title: minValue

unit._instruction: Add the unit of measurement of this quantitative value range.
unit.description: Determinate quantity adopted as a standard of measurement.
unit.title: unit
